roleset.name: ask a favor, ask a request, ask for

example.name: lobby-v: favor as infinitive
example.text: Ford, which already has an unwelcome 13.2% holding, is prepared to bid for the entire company and had lobbied the government to lift the takeover restrictions early.
example.arg: Ford, which already has an unwelcome 13.2% holding,
to lift the takeover restrictions early.

example.name: lobby-v: favor as PP
example.text: That was seen as an advantage in *trace* lobbying airline employees and Washington regulators for approval of the contested takeover.
example.arg: for approval of the contested takeover.

example.name: lobby-v: just favor
example.text: AMR-1 had also sought *trace*-1 to foil Mr. Trump in Congress by *trace*-1 lobbying for legislation that would have bolstered the authority of the Transportation Department to reject airline buy-outs.
example.arg: for legislation that would have bolstered the authority of the Transportation Department to reject airline buy-outs.
